extendedInfo.description: A Merry Christmas And A Prosperous New YearBe the first to wish your friends a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!Decorate the Christmas tree using a huge number of colourful toys and send a postcard with its image to the friends and relatives.You can congratulate them by email, using Skype, Twitter and social networks. Friends and native will be glad to receive a Christmas greetings in the form of the Christmas tree decorated by you on a card.Decorate The Christmas TreeShow the abilities in decoration of a Christmas tree. In your arsenal there will be multi-colored balls, colourful toys, bright candles and hand bells, huge boxes with gifts, various snowflakes and stars for a top of a Christmas tree. Your Christmas tree won't be similar to another. Use cheerful toys for creation of cheerful mood, socks and a wreath for giving of the Christmas atmosphere. Boxes with gifts put from below, near them you can place even the real Santa Claus. Snowflakes can be hung up nearby, they are similar to the real falling snowflakes.Prepare GreetingsKeep the Christmas trees in memory of a smartphone or a tablet. You can send a congratulations at any time using a card saved before. Prepare Christmas postcards for all the friends and acquaintances, and then send them to all at the same time, they will be very glad to such surprise. Be not surprised if someone from them sends you a similar congratulation. It's very pleasantly to exchange gifts on the eve of Christmas and new year.Enjoy the time carried out decorating a Christmas tree. Especially interesting to be engaged in it to children of all age. Good Christmas music which always can be disconnected won't allow to miss to you. After you learn to decorate our tree, you can start decorate real or artificial tree in the room or in a yard.Don't postpone decorating for later, time runs quickly, till Christmas remained absolutely slightly.Colourful GraphicsIn our game for decoration of a Christmas tree to you are provided:- various colourful balls- toys in the form of fantastic heroes- bright candles and hand bells- Christmas socks and wreaths- huge boxes with gifts- stars for a top of a Christmas tree- snowflakes of various unimaginable formsFeedbackIf you liked our application please leave the review. If you want new functions and opportunities - write to us, we will implement your offers with a pleasure.

reviews.title: Very fun...:)
reviews.comment: I enjoy decorating the tree. Wish there were some colored lights to add.
reviews.author: julia zeiler
